summary: Klaus is a young man in post-war Berlin. He is drawn to his friend Manfred and, under the encouragement of their acquaintance, Dr. Winkler, explore the underground world of gay clubs and ... See full summary »
cast: Paula Wessely|Paul Dahlke|Hans Nielsen|Ingrid Stenn|Christian Wolff|Friedrich Joloff|Herbert Hübner|Kurt Vespermann|Hilde Körber|Guenther Theil|Paul Esser|Siegfried Schürenberg|Peter Nijinskij|Otto Graf|Hans Schumm|Marcel André|Heinz Lingen|Susanne Paschen
title: El tercer sex
